item.title: Probabilistic Data Structures Part - 1
item.description: Suppose let’s say you are signing up for the new Email id. When you enter a new mail id,respective mail service will check whether the given mail id already exists. So how can we build such a kind of systems ? No, we cannot keep all email id’s in memory because it’s not practical. We can store all email id’s on disk and we can read from the disk and check whether the given mail id exists or not, but reading and writing to disk is time consuming.
